- Get mega creeps
- Wait near enemy fountain with teammates
- Toss teammates into fountain
- Teammates died
- Enemies team came back
- Lost. Got reported.

11/10 would do it again.

Dota 2 (English Defence of the Ancients 2, with English -.. "Protection of the Ancients 2" in Russian transliteration - Dota 2) - computer multiplayer team game in the genre of multiplayer online battle arena, developed by Valve Corporation. It is an independent continuation, modification DotA map for the game Warcraft III. Dota 2 works on the model of free-to-play with elements of micropayments.

Development of the game began in 2009, when the company Valve hired the main developer of DotA - IceFrog, the summer of 2010 has filed an application for registration of the trade mark . October 13, 2010 on the game portal Game Informer game was announced for release in 2011 . August 15, 2011 Trailer for the game  was published in the official blog. Dota 2 was released in July 2013 after two years was in beta testing .

Initially Dota 2 was released on the Source game engine, and then was ported to Source 2 in 2015, becoming the first game running on it . In Dota 2 provides the ability to create custom game modes, maps and registration of cosmetic items for the characters, and then add them to the Dota 2 using the Steam Workshop. Dota 2 is one of the most popular games on Steam and received generally positive reviews from critics for the gameplay, the production quality and the preservation of the positive aspects of its predecessor.  the complexity of the training has been noted among the main drawbacks of the game.

The game has taken two five-man teams participated, each of which has its own database on the map. All the players control one of the characters with unique abilities and different styles of play. The team that destroyed the main building of the enemy .

Dota 2 is active eSports discipline, in which professional teams from around the world compete in various leagues and tournaments. Premium Dota 2 tournaments have prize pools of millions of dollars, have been the largest in the history of eSports . The biggest tournament on the game - The International, held every year at the stadium Valve Key Arena in Seattle. Each season Valve also organizes The Major. Large professional tournaments Dota 2 broadcast on videostrimingovyh services, sometimes picking up more than one million viewers simultaneously

Well i think any shimmering light of hope this game had was completely ruined in the last few weeks by valve. it looks like this could be the final nail in the coffin for dota2. By the delayed siltbreaker almost 1 month late, over excessive punishments for very minor infractions, retarded looking cosmetics, and the introduction of pay2win, this game is not any better than some of the mobile games on the google play or apple store.

I like this game so much.  Of all the online games, this is what I play frequently.  You can gain your friendship as well as your strategies in playing.   This teaches us to be patient, positive and learn how to make a decisions.  I would recommend this to others but do not overuse our eyes in playing so much time.   One thing that I don't like are those players who uses bad words.  Thanks that you have placed a report on the options.  Do not mind if you win or lose.  It's only a game.  Don't ruin your personality, just stay at the right side and you will have victory in the end. Happy playing guys.
